title: This Patch is complete Crap
body: Riot really what did you think with this patch or did you think at all... this patch is complete crap. the game is more unbalanced it ever was since LoL joined Competetive. really you destroy the game experience of many players... pls dont do such shit again...

replies.body: i think its a pretty good patch

Juggernaut Patch ? 
I think Garen, Skarner , Darius and Morde really need that buffs!
